org.newdawn.slick.opengl
Class CursorLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.newdawn.slick.opengl.CursorLoader

public class CursorLoader
extends Object

A utility to load cursors (thanks go to Kappa for the animated cursor loader)

Author:
Kevin Glass, Kappa-One, Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>

getTransparencyThreshold

public float getTransparencyThreshold()
Get the current transparency threshold value.

Returns:
the transparency threshold
See Also:
setTransparencyThreshold(float)

setTransparencyThreshold

public void setTransparencyThreshold(float value)
Set the threshold value for the conversation between eight and one bit alpha. In case the opacity of a pixel is greater then the value applied here (1.0 fully opaque, 0.0 fully transparent) the pixel is altered as needed in case the host system does not support 8bit alpha cursors.

Parameters:
value - the threshold value
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - in case the value is less then 0 or greater then 1

getCursor

public org.lwjgl.input.Cursor getCursor(String ref,
                                        int x,
                                        int y)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        org.lwjgl.LWJGLException
Get a cursor based on a image reference on the classpath

Parameters:
ref - The reference to the image to be loaded
x - The x-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (left -> right)
y - The y-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (bottom -> top)
Returns:
The create cursor
Throws:
IOException - Indicates a failure to load the image
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException - Indicates a failure to create the hardware cursor
IllegalArgumentException - in case the width or the height is greater then the image width or height or in case height or width is 0 or less.

getCursor

public org.lwjgl.input.Cursor getCursor(ByteBuffer buf,
                                        int x,
                                        int y,
                                        int width,
                                        int height)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        org.lwjgl.LWJGLException
Get a cursor based on a set of image data

Parameters:
buf - The image data (stored in RGBA) to load the cursor from
x - The x-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (left -> right)
y - The y-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (bottom -> top)
width - The width of the image data provided
height - The height of the image data provided
Returns:
The create cursor
Throws:
IOException - Indicates a failure to load the image
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException - Indicates a failure to create the hardware cursor

getCursor

public org.lwjgl.input.Cursor getCursor(ByteBuffer buf,
                                        int x,
                                        int y,
                                        int width,
                                        int height,
                                        int imageWidth,
                                        int imageHeight)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        org.lwjgl.LWJGLException
Get a cursor based on a set of image data

Parameters:
buf - The image data (stored in RGBA) to load the cursor from
x - The x-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (left -> right)
y - The y-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (bottom -> top)
width - The width of the image data provided
height - The height of the image data provided
imageWidth - The width of the actual image, the pixels outside of this width are considered blank
imageHeight - The height of the actual image, the pixels outside of this height are considered blank
Returns:
The create cursor
Throws:
IOException - Indicates a failure to load the image
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException - Indicates a failure to create the hardware cursor
IllegalArgumentException - in case the width or the height is greater then the image width or height or in case height or width is 0 or less.

getCursor

public org.lwjgl.input.Cursor getCursor(ImageData imageData,
                                        int x,
                                        int y)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        org.lwjgl.LWJGLException
Get a cursor based on a set of image data

Parameters:
imageData - The data from which the cursor can read it's contents
x - The x-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (left -> right)
y - The y-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (bottom -> top)
Returns:
The create cursor
Throws:
IOException - Indicates a failure to load the image
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException - Indicates a failure to create the hardware cursor
IllegalArgumentException - in case the width or the height is greater then the image width or height or in case height or width is 0 or less.

getAnimatedCursor

public org.lwjgl.input.Cursor getAnimatedCursor(String ref,
                                                int x,
                                                int y,
                                                int width,
                                                int height,
                                                int[] cursorDelays)
                                         throws IOException,
                                                org.lwjgl.LWJGLException
Get a cursor based on a image reference on the classpath. The image is assumed to be a set/strip of cursor animation frames running from top to bottom.

Parameters:
ref - The reference to the image to be loaded
x - The x-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (left -> right)
y - The y-coordinate of the cursor hotspot (bottom -> top)
width - The x width of the cursor
height - The y height of the cursor
cursorDelays - image delays between changing frames in animation
Returns:
The created cursor
Throws:
IOException - Indicates a failure to load the image
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException - Indicates a failure to create the hardware cursor
IllegalArgumentException - in case the width or the height is greater then the image width or height or in case height or width is 0 or less.
